citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
The facility’s program of veterinary care does not address the parasite control protocol for the goats. The facility has been
deworming the goats monthly, but their AV stated that he would recommend a different protocol.
When the attending veterinarian is not given the appropriate authority, the provision of veterinary care may be inadequate
or inappropriate. The licensee must assure that the attending veterinarian has appropriate authority to ensure the
provision of adequate veterinary care and to oversee the adequacy of other aspects of animal care and use.
Correct by October 21, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.40(a)(2) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
The facility’s program of veterinary care does not address the parasite control protocol for the goats. The facility has been 
deworming the goats monthly, but their AV stated that he would recommend a different protocol.  
When the attending veterinarian is not given the appropriate authority, the provision of veterinary care may be inadequate 
or inappropriate. The licensee must assure that the attending veterinarian has appropriate authority to ensure the 
provision of adequate veterinary care and to oversee the adequacy of other aspects of animal care and use.  
Correct by October 21, 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
